versions.release_note:
增加配置项设置间隔时间
增加更多输出
增加ban_status_alert.txt输出可疑账号

Support config to control delay time
Add more output
Add ban_status_alert.txt output for suspicious accounts
修正极大概率不输出错误的账号\nFix likely no error accounts output

加入3次重试
查询失败额外导出文件

Add 3 retries
Add output for failed accounts
导出失败的账号\nAdd output for failed accounts
输出加入密码\nAdd password in output
移除点数的逗号\nRemove comma in steam points
修正账号货币是人民币时报错\nFix software error when account currency is CNY
增加查询更多东西\nAdd query for more fields
最后掉落物品只显示箱子\nOnly show cases as last drop item
额外查询非号主锁运行\nAdd ban check for stolen lock
